segments.text: This section of the store is called Junior . Why is that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It means young girls . That's where you'll find clothes for young girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I can't find anything in my size here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're small , but you're not a child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there's nothing I can do about my height !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a petite section that you an check out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has clothes in small sizes for small women .
segments.speaker: S2
